00057 //! usb_configure_endpoint.
00058 //!
00059 //!  This function configures an endpoint with the selected type.
00060 //!
00061 //!
00062 //! @param config0
00063 //! @param config1
00064 //!
00065 //! @return Is_endpoint_configured.
00066 //!
00067 U8 usb_config_ep(U8 config0, U8 config1)
00068 {
00069     Usb_enable_endpoint();
00070     UECFG0X = config0;
00071     UECFG1X = (UECFG1X & (1<<ALLOC)) | config1;
00072     Usb_allocate_memory();
00073     return (Is_endpoint_configured());
00074 }
00075 
00076 //! usb_select_endpoint_interrupt.
00077 //!
00078 //! This function select the endpoint where an event occurs and returns the
00079 //! number of this endpoint. If no event occurs on the endpoints, this
00080 //! function returns 0.
00081 //!
00082 //!
00083 //! @param none
00084 //!
00085 //! @return endpoint number.
00086 //!
00087 U8 usb_select_enpoint_interrupt(void)
00088 {
00089 U8 interrupt_flags;
00090 U8 ep_num;
00091 
00092    ep_num = 0;
00093    interrupt_flags = Usb_interrupt_flags();
00094 
00095    while(ep_num < MAX_EP_NB)
00096    {
00097       if (interrupt_flags & 1)
00098       {
00099          return (ep_num);
00100       }
00101       else
00102       {
00103          ep_num++;
00104          interrupt_flags = interrupt_flags >> 1;
00105       }
00106    }
00107    return 0;
00108 }
00109 
00110 //! usb_send_packet.
00111 //!
00112 //! This function moves the data pointed by tbuf to the selected endpoint fifo
00113 //! and sends it through the USB.
00114 //!
00115 //!
00116 //! @param ep_num       number of the addressed endpoint
00117 //! @param *tbuf        address of the first data to send
00118 //! @param data_length  number of bytes to send
00119 //!
00120 //! @return address of the next U8 to send.
00121 //!
00122 //! Example:
00123 //! usb_send_packet(3,&first_data,0x20);    // send packet on the endpoint #3
00124 //! while(!(Usb_tx_complete));              // wait packet ACK'ed by the Host
00125 //! Usb_clear_tx_complete();                     // acknowledge the transmit
00126 //!
00127 //! Note:
00128 //! tbuf is incremented of 'data_length'.
00129 //!
00130 U8 usb_send_packet(U8 ep_num, U8* tbuf, U8 data_length)
00131 {
00132 U8 remaining_length;
00133 
00134    remaining_length = data_length;
00135    Usb_select_endpoint(ep_num);
00136    while(Is_usb_write_enabled() && (0 != remaining_length))
00137    {
00138       Usb_write_byte(*tbuf);
00139       remaining_length--;
00140       tbuf++;
00141    }
00142    return remaining_length;
00143 }
00144 
00145 //! usb_read_packet.
00146 //!
00147 //! This function moves the data stored in the selected endpoint fifo to
00148 //! the address specified by *rbuf.
00149 //!
00150 //!
00151 //! @param ep_num       number of the addressed endpoint
00152 //! @param *rbuf        aaddress of the first data to write with the USB data
00153 //! @param data_length  number of bytes to read
00154 //!
00155 //! @return address of the next U8 to send.
00156 //!
00157 //! Example:
00158 //! while(!(Usb_rx_complete));                      // wait new packet received
00159 //! usb_read_packet(4,&first_data,usb_get_nb_byte); // read packet from ep 4
00160 //! Usb_clear_rx();                                 // acknowledge the transmit
00161 //!
00162 //! Note:
00163 //! rbuf is incremented of 'data_length'.
00164 //!
00165 U8 usb_read_packet(U8 ep_num, U8* rbuf, U8  data_length)
00166 {
00167 U8 remaining_length;
00168 
00169    remaining_length = data_length;
00170    Usb_select_endpoint(ep_num);
00171 
00172    while(Is_usb_read_enabled() && (0 != remaining_length))
00173    {
00174       *rbuf = Usb_read_byte();
00175       remaining_length--;
00176       rbuf++;
00177    }
00178    return remaining_length;
00179 }
00180 
00181 //! usb_halt_endpoint.
00182 //!
00183 //! This function sends a STALL handshake for the next Host request. A STALL
00184 //! handshake will be send for each next request untill a SETUP or a Clear Halt
00185 //! Feature occurs for this endpoint.
00186 //!
00187 //! @param ep_num number of the addressed endpoint
00188 //!
00189 //! @return none
00190 //!
00191 void usb_halt_endpoint (U8 ep_num)
00192 {
00193    Usb_select_endpoint(ep_num);
00194    Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00195 }
00196 
00197 //! usb_init_device.
00198 //!
00199 //! This function initializes the USB device controller and
00200 //! configures the Default Control Endpoint.
00201 //!
00202 //!
00203 //! @param none
00204 //!
00205 //! @return status
00206 //!
00207 U8 usb_init_device (void)
00208 {
00209    Usb_select_device();
00210    if(Is_usb_id_device())
00211    {
00212       Usb_select_endpoint(EP_CONTROL);
00213       if(!Is_usb_endpoint_enabled())
00214       {
00215 #if (USB_LOW_SPEED_DEVICE==DISABLE)
00216          return usb_configure_endpoint(EP_CONTROL,    \
00217                                 TYPE_CONTROL,  \
00218                                 DIRECTION_OUT, \
00219                                 SIZE_64,       \
00220                                 ONE_BANK,      \
00221                                 NYET_DISABLED);
00222 #else
00223          return usb_configure_endpoint(EP_CONTROL,    \
00224                                 TYPE_CONTROL,  \
00225                                 DIRECTION_OUT, \
00226                                 SIZE_8,       \
00227                                 ONE_BANK,      \
00228                                 NYET_DISABLED);
00229 #endif
00230       }
00231    }
00232    return FALSE;
00233 }
00234 
00235 #endif

00241 #if (USB_HOST_FEATURE == ENABLED)

00243 //! usb_configure_pipe.
00244 //!
00245 //!  This function configures a pipe with the selected type.
00246 //!
00247 //!
00248 //! @param config0
00249 //! @param config1
00250 //!
00251 //! @return Is_endpoint_configured.
00252 U8 host_config_pipe(U8 config0, U8 config1)
00253 {
00254     Host_enable_pipe();
00255     UPCFG0X = config0;
00256     UPCFG1X = config1;
00257     Host_allocate_memory();
00258     return (Is_pipe_configured());
00259 }
00260 
00261 //! host_determine_pipe_size.
00262 //!
00263 //!  This function returns the size configuration register value according
00264 //!  to the endpint size detected inthe device enumeration process.
00265 //!
00266 //! @return pipe size register value.
00267 //!
00268 U8 host_determine_pipe_size(U16 size)
00269 {
00270         if(size <= 8  ) {return (SIZE_8   );}
00271    else if(size <= 16 ) {return (SIZE_16  );}
00272    else if(size <= 32 ) {return (SIZE_32  );}
00273    else if(size <= 64 ) {return (SIZE_64  );}
00274    else if(size <= 128) {return (SIZE_128 );}
00275    else if(size <= 256) {return (SIZE_256 );}
00276    else if(size <= 512) {return (SIZE_512 );}
00277    else                 {return (SIZE_1024);}
00278 
00279 }
00280 
00281 //! host_disable_all_pipe.
00282 //!
00283 //!  This function disable all pipes for the host controller
00284 //!  Usefull to execute upon device disconnection.
00285 //!
00286 //! @return none.
00287 //!
00288 void host_disable_all_pipe(void)
00289 {
00290 U8 i;
00291    for (i=0;i<7;i++)
00292    {
00293       Host_reset_pipe(i);
00294       Host_select_pipe(i);
00295       Host_unallocate_memory();
00296       Host_disable_pipe();
00297    }
00298 }
00299 
00300 //! @brief Returns the pipe number that generates a USB communication interrupt
00301 //!
00302 //! This function sould be called only when an interrupt has been detected. Otherwize
00303 //! the return value is incorect
00304 //!
00305 //! @param none
00306 //!
00307 //! @return pipe_number
00308 //!
00309 U8 usb_get_nb_pipe_interrupt(void)
00310 {
00311 U8 interrupt_flags;
00312 U8 i;
00313 
00314    interrupt_flags = Host_get_pipe_interrupt();
00315    for(i=0;i< MAX_EP_NB;i++)
00316    {
00317       if (interrupt_flags & (1<<i))
00318       {
00319          return (i);
00320       }
00321    }
00322    // This return should never occurs ....
00323    return MAX_EP_NB+1;
00324 }
